description.translate: Let us break this peace so quiet, that even the eternal mornings may fear us.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Rage de Sôrän\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Brisons cette paix si tranquille, pour\"}","{\"text\":\"§7que même les matins éternels nous craignent.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Let us break this peace so quiet, that\"}","{\"text\":\"§7even the eternal mornings may fear us.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a1 §7HER§c-1\"}"],color:16514979}}
